quotes.quote: When I die, I want to go peacefully like my grandfather did–in his sleep. Not yelling and screaming like the passengers in his car.
quotes.name: BOB MONKHOUSE

quotes.quote: I have six locks on my door all in a row. When I go out, I lock every other one. I figure no matter how long somebody stands there picking the locks, they are always locking three.
quotes.name: ELAYNE BOOSLER

quotes.quote: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won’t expect it back.
quotes.name: OSCAR WILDE

quotes.quote: The scientific theory I like best is that the rings of Saturn are composed entirely of lost airline luggage.
quotes.name: MARK RUSSELL

quotes.quote: Friendship is like peeing on yourself: everyone can see it, but only you get the warm feeling that it brings.
quotes.name: ROBERT BLOCH

quotes.quote: First the doctor told me the good news: I was going to have a disease named after me.
quotes.name: STEVE MARTIN

quotes.quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
quotes.name: LANA TURNER

quotes.quote: How do you get a sweet little 80-year-old lady to say the F word? Get another sweet little 80-year-old lady to yell 'BINGO!'
quotes.name: ANONYMOUS

quotes.quote: My therapist told me the way to achieve true inner peace is to finish what I start. So far I’ve finished two bags of M&Ms and a chocolate cake. I feel better already.
quotes.name: DAVE BERRY

quotes.quote: Dogs have masters. Cats have staff.
quotes.name: ANONYMOUS

quotes.quote: I hate when old people poke you at a wedding and say "you're next". So next time I was at a funeral I poked them and said "you're next".
quotes.name: ANONYMOUS

quotes.quote: I think the worst time to have a heart attack is during a game of charades.
quotes.name: DEMETRI MARTIN

quotes.quote: I was asked to name all the presidents. I thought they already had names.
quotes.name: DEMITRI MARTIN

quotes.quote: USA Today has come out with a new survey. Apparently three out of every four people make up 75 percent of the population.
quotes.name: DAVE LETTERMAN

quotes.quote: I'm not as think as you drunk I am.
quotes.name: ANONYMOUS

quotes.quote: When people ask me how many people work here, I say, about a third of them.
quotes.name: LISA KENNEDY MONTGOMERY

quotes.quote: I can resist everything except temptation.
quotes.name: OSCAR WILDE

quotes.quote: I refuse to answer that quesiton on the grounds that I don't know the answer..
quotes.name: DOUGLAS ADAMS

quotes.quote: Life is too short to remove USB safely.
quotes.name: ANONYMOUS

quotes.quote: Do not argue with an idiot. He will drag you down to his level and beat you with experience.
quotes.name: GREG KING

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.name: MARGARET MEAD

quotes.quote: I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you.
quotes.name: ROBING WILLIAMS

quotes.quote: One advantage of talking to yourself is that you know at least somebody's listening.
quotes.name: FRANKLIN P. JONES

quotes.quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.
quotes.name: BENJAMIN FRANKLIN

quotes.quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
quotes.name: MITCH HEDBERG

quotes.quote: If two wrongs don't make a right, try three.
quotes.name: LAURENCE J. PETER

quotes.quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
quotes.name: MARK TWAIN

quotes.quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
quotes.name: WINSTON CHURCHILL

quotes.quote: I never said most of the things I said.
quotes.name: YOGI BERRA
